resources.string: This app uses The Movie Database (TMDb) API for content but is not endorsed or certified by TMDb.
Paranormal investigators tackle dark forces in two terrifying real-life cases. (The Conjuring 1 & 2)
A skilled thief infiltrates dreams to steal secrets but must plant an idea in a mind instead. (Inception)
A former assassin seeks revenge on her ex-lover and teammates who tried to kill her. (Kill Bill Vol. 1 & 2)
A shy Parisian girl decides to help others find happiness in whimsical, imaginative ways. (Amélie)
A teenager accidentally travels to 1955 and must ensure his parents fall in love. (Back to the Future)
Two detectives hunt a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as his motive. (Se7en)
Three friends deal with the hilarious fallout of wild bachelor parties gone wrong. (The Hangover Trilogy)
A shape-shifting clown terrorizes children in a small town, feeding off their fears. (It)
Earth is dying, and a team of astronauts travels through a wormhole to find a new home for humanity. (Interstellar)
Interconnected stories of hitmen, boxers, and criminals in L.A., full of sharp dialogue and violence. (Pulp Fiction)
A man is temporarily granted God’s powers and learns responsibility and faith. (Bruce Almighty)
Five high school students from different cliques bond during Saturday detention. (The Breakfast Club)
An insomniac office worker forms an underground fight club that spirals out of control. (Fight Club)
An L.A. cop and a Hong Kong inspector team up for action-packed, comedic adventures. (Rush Hour Trilogy)
A cursed videotape causes horrifying deaths unless the mystery behind it is solved. (Ring Trilogy)
A U.S. Marshal investigates a missing patient in a psychiatric facility, uncovering dark truths. (Shutter Island)
A freed slave partners with a bounty hunter to rescue his wife from a brutal plantation owner. (Django Unchained)
A kind-hearted man unwittingly influences major historical events across decades. (Forrest Gump)
Dinosaurs are cloned and brought back to life, but a park visit turns into a survival nightmare. (Jurassic Park)
A cartoonist becomes obsessed with finding the real identity of the Zodiac Killer. (Zodiac)
A top London cop uncovers a murderous conspiracy in a sleepy village. (Hot Fuzz)
A virus devastates Britain, turning people into rage-filled creatures. (28 Days Later)
A man fights for survival and understanding in a world where time can move backward. (Tenet)
A group of Jewish soldiers plans to assassinate Nazi leaders during WWII. (Inglourious Basterds)
A black pianist and his Italian-American driver form an unlikely friendship on a 1960s tour. (Green Book)
A charming teen skips school and enjoys a wild day around Chicago. (Ferris Bueller’s Day Off)
A man becomes the focus of media frenzy when his wife mysteriously disappears. (Gone Girl)
Two journalists are recruited to assassinate North Korea’s leader during a TV interview trip. (The Interview)
A family unravels disturbing secrets after the death of their secretive grandmother. (Hereditary)
A man with short-term memory loss uses notes and tattoos to hunt his wife’s killer. (Memento)
Break day! Choose any movie you love or revisit a favorite from the month.
